column2: REFILE-UPDATE 3-U.S. equity futures at six-week low after Trump healthcare setback March 26 U.S. equity index futures fell to a six-week low on Sunday in a sign Wall Street would start the week defensively after Republicans pulled legislation to overhaul the U.S. healthcare system in a stunning setback for President Donald Trump. ~
